name: Robot Rumble (boogalords)
description:
Destroy all enemies in a room before proceeding to the next one.

Electrify the water to increase damage and hit multiple targets at once.

Combine pools of water to spread affect larger areas to send electricity throughout the entire room.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Left Click to shoot electricity

Right Click to spill water that can be electrified or frozen to harm enemies

R to recharge your weapon and freeze the water

ESC to quit

Team: Timothy Davis, Darragh Farrell
